question: Which among the following hospital became the first hospital to successfully conduct the Convalescent Plasma Therapy (CPT) treatment to COVID-19 patient?
explanation: King George Medical University of Lucknow became the first hospital to successfully conduct the Convalescent Plasma Therapy (CPT) treatment to COVID-19 patients. In this procedure, Plasma is collected from the blood of a cured COVID-19 patient and transfused to a severely ill coronavirus patient to boost antibody formation.
